.isupper.description: check if all of the string is upper str

.islower.description: check if all of the string is lower str

.lower.description: lower all the str in the string

.upper.description: upper all the str in the string

.zfill.description: fill the zero with blank to make the length turn into width

.isspace.description: check if the string contains only space

.isdigit.description: return True if it is a digit string

.isprintable.description: check if it is a printable object

.isnumeric.description: check if the string contains only numbers

.endswith.description: return True if the string ends with another string

.isidentifier.description: check if the string is a valid python identifier

.title.description: return a version of the string where each word is titlecased.
